sentence.Network_en: Results The characteristic spots of Astilbe chinensis were identified by TLC.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果文中报道的薄层色谱方法可鉴别出落新妇的特征斑点.

sentence.Network_en: Methods Astilbe chinensis in Yushangling Capsule were identified by TLC.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法采用薄层色谱(TLC)法对愈伤灵胶囊中的落新妇进行鉴别.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To isolate and determine the chemical constituents from Astilbe chinensis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 对落新妇的化学成分进行分离和结构鉴定.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Advance of Chemical Constituents and Medicinal Effect of Astilbe Plants落新妇属植物化学成分和药理活性研究进展

list.abs: objective To study the identification and determination of Bergeninum in Chinese astilbe rhizome .目的对落新妇根中岩白菜素的鉴别及含量测定方法进行研究。

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek a- 'not' + stilbē, feminine of stilbos 'glittering' (because the individual flowers are small and inconspicuous)

means.word_mean: 1. any plant of the genus Astilbe having compound leaves and showy panicles of tiny colorful flowers
